deliveryInfo.mainHeading: Order by 10pm for free next day delivery on Orders overs $100
deliveryInfo.subHeading: We deliver Monday to Saturday - excluding Holidays

freeDeliveryInfo.mainHeading: Free next day delivery to stores.
freeDeliveryInfo.subHeading: Home delivery is $4.99 for orders under $100 and is FREE for all orders over $100

freeReturnInfo: 30 days to return it to us for a refund. We have made returns SO EASY - you can now return your order to a store or send it with FedEx FOR FREE
